Package me.m64diamondstar.dialoguemaster.api.design.font

Interface DMFontConfig

public interface DMFontConfig

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Gets the name of this font configuration.
      Returns:
      The name of the font configuration.

    • getFamily

      String getFamily()
      Gets the family of the font. If the font is not found, it will use the default font.
      Returns:
      The family of the font.

    • setFamily

      void setFamily(String family)
      Sets the family of the font. The default Minecraft font is called "default", but you can also import other fonts by putting them inside the "import/font" folder inside the DialogueMaster plugin folder.
      Parameters:
      family -

    • getSize

      int getSize()
      Gets the size of the font.
      Returns:
      The size of the font.

    • setSize

      void setSize(int size)
      Sets the size of the font. 12 is recommended for most fonts.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the font.

    • getOversample

      int getOversample()
      Gets the oversample of the font. This is the quality at which it renders the font.
      Returns:
      The oversample of the font.

    • setOversample

      void setOversample(int oversample)
      Sets the oversample of the font. This is the quality at which it renders the font. 16 is recommended for most fonts.
      Parameters:
      oversample - The oversample of the font.

    • getVerticalShift

      float getVerticalShift()
      Gets the vertical shift of the font.
      Returns:
      The vertical shift of the font.

    • setVerticalShift

      void setVerticalShift(float verticalShift)
      Sets the vertical shift of the font.
      Parameters:
      verticalShift - The vertical shift of the font.

    • getLineSpacing

      float getLineSpacing()

    • setLineSpacing

      void setLineSpacing(float lineSpacing)
